article.title: Smiths Detection to Provide Chemical Agent Detectors
article.text: Smiths Detection, Edgewood, Maryland, was awarded a $21,867,004 modification (P00040) to firm-fixed-fee contract (W911SR-07-C-0080) to exercise the option to purchase 3,353 M4A1 joint chemical agent detectors, 580 communication adapter kits, one platform interface kit, 2,713 Stryker communication adaptors, 137 sieve packs and 25 nozzles. Army Contracting Command Edgewood Division, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland is the contracting activity.
